string.value: You should talk to #b#p1202004##k, standing on the road to town.

#p1202004# says that it makes perfect sense that you don't know how to hold a weapon, since you've lost your memory. He then tells you that maybe battling a monster would jog your memory and asks you to defeat #r#o9300383##k. You wonder if you can do it.
You defeated #o9300383#, but it hasn't jogged any memories. You have a feeling that your skills and abilities were lost, just like your memories. What kind of a hero are you if you have no abilities?
Seeing your face tells me you didn't get a whole lot out of defeating that monster, but don't worry. I am sure things will work out. Here's a potion for you. Good luck!
I see that you have yet to defeat all the #r#o9300383#s#k yet. Take on about #r3#k of them, and maybe that'll jog your memory.
